title: A Symphony of Blood
description: In the world of Tyriel there have been many heroes, none more famous than the monster slayer, Gerhold of Vilheim. After the wife of a powerful lord is kidnapped by a vampire, Gerhold is hired to track down the creature. Upon reaching the vampire’s castle he is issued his greatest challenge: fight his way through the monster’s fortress and rescue the woman, or fail, and leave the lady to the unavoidable fate of undeath.  A Symphony of Blood is a heart pounding action-adventure fantasy novella that will keep you riveted until the final page.
author: J.S. Matthews
